title: Does kissing one's spouse while fasting and finding a taste breaks one's fast-Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: a sister says she's married and she's asking about being intimate with her husband if she kisses his hand or cheek and she finds a taste well if your husband is covered in chocolate definitely this breaks your fasting but if you kiss someone's hand and you find the taste to that this is nothing it has no impact because there is no mass nothing actual to find the taste of and the taste itself does not break your fasting
